tool_description: Optimizes work order assignments across multiple technicians using constraint satisfaction and multi-objective optimization algorithms.

optimization_goal.description: Primary optimization objective: minimize_travel, maximize_utilization, balance_workload, minimize_time

priority_weight.description: Importance weight for work order priority (0-1)

error_messages: Invalid optimization parameters: All weight parameters must sum to approximately 1.0
Insufficient resources: Not enough qualified technicians for the given work orders
Optimization timeout: Could not find optimal solution within time limit
Invalid goal parameter: Use one of [minimize_travel, maximize_utilization, balance_workload, minimize_time]
Constraint violation: Assignment violates hard constraints (skills, availability, or capacity)
usage: Provide work orders and technicians, then tune optimization parameters based on business priorities. Higher weights emphasize different optimization aspects.

assignments.description: Optimized work order to technician assignments

unassigned_orders.description: Work orders that could not be assigned

total_travel_time.description: Total travel time across all assignments in minutes
